TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract ValueSerializer extends System.Object

summary.span: 为从对象表示形式进行序列化定义转换行为的抽象类。

span.span: Abstract class that defines conversion behavior for serialization from an object representation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 转换器返回的用于序列化的字符串必须是无损的且该转换器必须始终返回特定值的相同字符串。The string a converter returns for serialization must be loss-less and the converter must always return the same string for a particular value. 如果类型转换器 (派生自) 并不满足这些要求在其`ConvertTo`实现字符串输出、 自定义必须声明。If a type converter (derived from ) does not meet these requirements in its `ConvertTo` implementations for string output, a custom must be declared. 任一应满足要求，则为 null应为的类型相关联。Either the should meet the requirements, or a null should be associated with the type. A通过应用是与该类型关联属性。A is associated with a type by applying the attribute. Null该值指示应为对象图中的转换为字符串转换忽略的类型转换器。A null indicates the type converter should be ignored for convert-to-string conversions from the object graph. > [!IMPORTANT] > 实现应避免引发异常。Implementation of should avoid throwing exceptions. 引发的任何异常都会终止序列化。Any exceptions thrown could terminate serialization. 有关和及其 Api 相当于为。 for a and its APIs is analogous to for a . 事实上，继承。In fact, inherits . 当调用派生的类 API 时，调用方 （通常一个序列化程序的过程） 传递可能提供某些服务的上下文。When a derived class API is called, the caller (typically a serializer process) passes a context that may provide certain services. 由于常规指南，必须不引发异常。Because of the general guidance that a must not throw exceptions. 无法从上下文中返回特定服务还必须不引发任何异常。Failure to return a particular service from the context must also not throw any exceptions. 在以前版本的.NET Framework 中，此类特定于 WPF 程序集 WindowsBase 中存在。In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this class existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase. 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，位于 System.Xaml 程序集中。In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], is in the System.Xaml assembly. 有关详细信息，请参阅[类型从 WPF 迁移到 System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md)。For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数的正文为空;类并不包含任何需要初始化的值。The body of this constructor is empty; the class does not contain any values that require initialization.

MemberSignature.Value: protected Exception GetConvertFromException (object value);
.method familyhidebysig instance class System.Exception GetConvertFromException(object value) cil managed
Protected Function GetConvertFromException (value As Object) As Exception
protected: Exception ^ GetConvertFromException(System::Object ^ value);

span.span: The object that could not be converted.

summary.span: 返回当转换无法执行时所引发的异常。

span.span: Returns an exception to throw when a conversion cannot be performed.

returns.span: 用于在无法执行 转换时引发异常的 对象。

span.span: An object for the exception to throw when a conversion cannot be performed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实际`throw`关键字不调用此方法，因此典型用法是`throw GetConvertFromException`（与提供的参数）。The actual `throw` keyword is not invoked by this method, therefore the typical usage is `throw GetConvertFromException` (with parameters provided). 返回特定异常，与`value`传递异常消息中。The specific exception returned is , with `value` passed in the exception message. 使用情况的模式是与中的异常实用工具相同。The pattern for usage is the same as for exception utilities in .

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Windows.Markup.ValueSerializer GetSerializerFor (System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor descriptor);

Public Shared Function GetSerializerFor (descriptor As PropertyDescriptor) As ValueSerializer
public: static System::Windows::Markup::ValueSerializer ^ GetSerializerFor(System::ComponentModel::PropertyDescriptor ^ descriptor);

param.name: descriptor
param.span: 要进行序列化的属性的 CLR 属性描述符。

span.span: The CLR property descriptor for the property to be serialized.

summary.span: 通过传递属性的 CLR 属性描述符，获取为该属性声明的 。

span.span: Gets the declared for a property, by passing a CLR property descriptor for the property.

returns.span: 与指定属性相关联的序列化程序。

span.span: The serializer associated with the specified property.
May return .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A针对属性，或用作属性值的类型，指示通过应用在属性或类型声明的属性。A for a property, or for a type that is used as the value for a property, is indicated by applying the attribute on the property or type declaration. 方法是一个读取的 CLR 类型系统信息并返回一个新的实用工具方法类基于在的属性，如果找到的属性上或然后，如果该属性的类型上找到。The method is a utility method that reads the CLR type system information and returns a new class based on the attribute if found on the property, or then if found on the property's type. `null` 可能会返回任何此类序列化程序是否存在。`null` might be returned if no such serializer exists. `null` 也可能如果类型或属性有意使用特性化一个 null 值会返回。`null` might also be returned if a type or property is deliberately attributed with a null-value . 另一种模式，支持为返回内部`TypeConverterValueSerializer`类，该类是包装的实现，并将转换`Convert`方法`Convert*String`方法 (例如调用时使用的输入类型，并将转换为。Another mode that supports is returning the internal `TypeConverterValueSerializer` class, which is a implementation that wraps a and translates the `Convert` methods to `Convert*String` methods (for instance is called with input of the type, and translates to . 仅在满足以下所有的情况中完成此操作：This is done only in cases where all of the following are true: - A在相关的属性或相关属性的类型上找到。A is found on the relevant property, or the relevant property's type. - 指示可以成功构造。The indicated can be successfully constructed. - 返回`true`为，称为引用类型。The returns `true` for , called referencing the type. - 返回`true`为，称为引用类型。The returns `true` for , called referencing the type. - 返回`true`为，称为引用类型。The returns `true` for , called referencing the type. > [!NOTE] > 以下是特殊情况：类型返回;类型返回一个内部但功能序列化程序 (`StringValueSerializer`)。The following are special cases: types return a ; types return an internal but functional serializer (`StringValueSerializer`).

span.span: is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A类型表示通过应用在类型声明的属性。A for a type is indicated by applying the attribute on the type declaration. 方法是一个读取的 CLR 类型系统信息并返回一个新的实用工具方法类基于在的属性，如果在指定上找到`type`。The method is a utility method that reads the CLR type system information and returns a new class based on the attribute if found on the specified `type`. `null` 可能会返回任何此类序列化程序是否存在。`null` might be returned if no such serializer exists. `null` 此外可能有意特性类型化使用 null 值会返回。`null` might also be returned if a type is deliberately attributed with a null-value . 另一种模式，支持为返回内部`TypeConverterValueSerializer`类，该类是包装的实现，并将转换`Convert`方法`Convert*String`方法 (例如调用时使用的输入类型，并将转换为。Another mode that supports is returning the internal `TypeConverterValueSerializer` class, which is a implementation that wraps a and translates the `Convert` methods to `Convert*String` methods (for instance is called with input of the type, and translates to . 仅在满足以下所有的情况中完成此操作：This is done only in cases where all of the following are true: - A上找到`type`。A is found on `type`. - 指示可以成功构造。The indicated can be successfully constructed. - 返回`true`为，称为引用类型。The returns `true` for , called referencing the type. - 返回`true`为，称为引用类型。The returns `true` for , called referencing the type. - 返回`true`为，称为引用类型。The returns `true` for , called referencing the type. > [!NOTE] > 以下是特殊情况：类型返回;类型返回一个内部但功能序列化程序 (`StringValueSerializer`)。The following are special cases: types return a ; types return an internal but functional serializer (`StringValueSerializer`).

public: static System::Windows::Markup::ValueSerializer ^ GetSerializerFor(System::ComponentModel::PropertyDescriptor ^ descriptor, System::Windows::Markup::IValueSerializerContext ^ context);

param.name: descriptor
param.span: 要进行序列化的属性的描述符。

span.span: Descriptor for the property to be serialized.

param.name: context
param.span: 用于转换的上下文信息。

span.span: Context information that is used for conversion.

summary.span: 使用指定的上下文获取为指定的属性声明的 。

span.span: Gets the declared for the specified property, using the specified context.

returns.span: 与指定属性相关联的序列化程序。

span.span: The serializer associated with the specified property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 而不是仅仅依赖属性报告在 CLR 类型系统中，此重载使用`context`作为一种服务，并调用服务的实现。Rather than relying purely on attributes reported in the CLR type system, this overload uses the `context` as a service, and calls the service's implementation of . 实现将通常还依赖于`descriptor`，但可能实现的某些上下文中的特殊行为。The implementation would typically also rely on the `descriptor`, but might implement special behavior for certain contexts. 当调用方具有可用时，应调用此方法从服务。This method should be called when the caller has an available from a service. 这将确保正确返回特定的上下文。This will ensure that the correct is returned for the specific context. 如果上下文返回`null`从其为您指定`descriptor`，或如果您指定的上下文是`null`，则行为是相当于调用重载。If the context returns `null` from its for your specified `descriptor`, or if the context you specify is `null`, then behavior is identical to calling the overload.

span.span: is .

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<Type> TypeReferences (object value, System.Windows.Markup.IValueSerializerContext context);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Type> TypeReferences(object value, class System.Windows.Markup.IValueSerializerContext context) cil managed
Public Overridable Function TypeReferences (value As Object, context As IValueSerializerContext) As IEnumerable(Of Type)
public: virtual System::Collections::Generic::IEnumerable<Type ^> ^ TypeReferences(System::Object ^ value, System::Windows::Markup::IValueSerializerContext ^ context);

span.span: The value being serialized.

param.name: context
param.span: 用于转换的上下文信息。

span.span: Context information that is used for conversion.

summary.span: 获取 引用的类型的枚举。

span.span: Gets an enumeration of the types referenced by the .

returns.span: 此序列化程序所转换的类型。

span.span: The types converted by this serializer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 任何类型将应包括在返回的枚举。Any types a converts should be included in the returned enumeration. 这样，以确保反序列化程序有足够的类型的信息，此序列化程序将转换的序列化程序。This allows a serializer to ensure a de-serializer has enough information about the types this serializer converts. 重写此方法是一个高级的方案。Overriding this method is an advanced scenario. 重写应仅有必要如果你要实现一个系统 CLR 类型系统所有者类型和属性的关系可用于的 XAML 架构上下文不报告足够的信息。Overriding should only be necessary if you are implementing a system where CLR type system ownertype-property relationships available to a XAML schema context do not report enough information. ## WPF 用法说明WPF Usage Notes [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]属性系统实现重写一个内部值序列化程序因为依赖项属性的概念，它可以已添加的所有者。The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] property system implements an internal value serializer that overrides because a dependency property has a concept that it can have added owners. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 表达式还具有特殊的内部处理。 expressions also have special internal handling.
